schemacrawler.schemacrawler

Interface InclusionRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String>, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    InclusionRuleWithRegularExpression
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExcludeAll, IncludeAll, RegularExpressionExclusionRule, RegularExpressionInclusionRule, RegularExpressionRule
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface InclusionRule
extends java.io.Serializable, java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String>
    Specifies inclusion and exclusion patterns that can be applied to the names, definitions, and other attributes of named objects.

    The text to check, which could be the fully qualified name of the named object, the definition, or some other attribute of the named object.

    Author:
    Sualeh Fatehi

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.function.Predicate

        and, isEqual, negate, or, test
